dmca.title: [ABUSE] [XILO Security and Abuse Ticket #6956]: DMCA Takedown Notice
dmca.body:
The site doesn't appear to be accesible.


 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 31, 2005 5:59 PM
To: abuse@xilo.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [XILO Security and Abuse Ticket #6956]: DMCA Takedown
Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] [XILO Security and Abuse Ticket #6956]: DMCA Takedown
Notice
Date: Tue, 31 May 2005 02:45:54 +0100
From: XILO Security and Abuse <abuse@xilo.net>
Reply-To: XILO Security and Abuse <abuse@xilo.net>
To: support@anyinfo.info, abuse@theplanet.com, int@xilo.net

Dear Sirs,

RE http://www.anyinfo.info/

[root@pingu root]# host anyinfo.info
anyinfo.info has address 70.84.255.163
[root@pingu root]# whois 70.84.255.163
[Querying whois.arin.net]
[whois.arin.net]

OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
OrgID:      TPCM
Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Address:    Suite 110
City:       Dallas
StateProv:  TX
PostalCode: 75207
Country:    US


We notice from the above URL that content which is Copyright of XILO
(Manchester, UK), has been used without prior permission.

While we believe that the above information gives your company more than a
sufficient basis for disabling the page immediately, out of caution we note
that your user's unauthorized reproduction of XILO's copyrighted materials
violates federal law, and places an independent legal obligation on your
company to remove the offending page(s) immediately upon receiving notice
from XILO, the owner of the copyrighted materials.
Accordingly, the information below serves as XILO's notice of infringement
pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
Section 512 (c)(3)(A):

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owner being named XILO. I have a good faith belief that the
website located at URL http://www.anyinfo.info/ as its copyright in each
page of its website and associated source code. Please act expeditiously to
remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

We sincerely appreciate your immediate attention to this important matter.
We would also appreciate if you would take steps to confirm the accuracy of
any contact information that your user may have provided to you in
establishing the account. Should you have any accurate information that
could assist eBay and law enforcement in tracking this individual, we
greatly appreciate your assistance, as we know that you do not condone the
use of your services for such criminal purposes.

We await your most detailed reply.


- --
Sales and Support Assistance
XILO : Internet Hosting and Online Services http://www.xilo.net/

Refer us to your friends and family and earn
